title: White House says will continue to "fully cooperate" with Mueller
text:
White House says will continue to "fully cooperate" with Mueller 4:00am IST - 00:33 
White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said the Trump administration would continue to ''fully cooperate'' with U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller after the New York Times reported that Mueller subpoenaed the Trump Organization for documents, including some related to Russia. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
